location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], to Charles Crommelin, President and Governor at Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: some of the edge of the page have been torn away, obscuring some text, especially along the bottom corners.

mods.abstract: The letter is cover for the Basra accounts and a shipment of treasure and copper. The letter discusses the situation with meer mahana [MÄ«r Muhanna], who is preventing trade between Schyrass and Bushire, and the possibility that Sadoo Caun [Sadiq Khan Zand] may send a force against him.
